commands.title: List directory contents
commands.description: List all files including hidden, with human-readable sizes and permissions

commands.title: Change directory
commands.description: Navigate to specified directory

commands.title: Print working directory
commands.description: Show current directory full path

commands.title: Create directory
commands.description: Create directory including parent directories if needed

commands.title: Remove file
commands.description: Delete a file

commands.title: Remove directory recursively
commands.description: Delete directory and all contents (use with caution!)

commands.title: Copy file
commands.description: Copy file to new location

commands.title: Copy directory recursively
commands.description: Copy directory and all contents

commands.title: Move/rename file
commands.description: Move file or rename it

commands.title: View file contents
commands.description: Display entire file contents

commands.title: View file with pagination
commands.description: View file contents with scrolling (q to quit)

commands.title: View last lines of file
commands.description: Show last N lines of file

commands.title: Follow file in real-time
commands.description: Monitor file as new lines are added (useful for logs)

commands.title: View first lines of file
commands.description: Show first N lines of file

commands.title: Count lines in file
commands.description: Count number of lines in file

commands.title: Disk usage of directory
commands.description: Show total size of directory in human-readable format

commands.title: Disk space on filesystem
commands.description: Show disk space usage for all mounted filesystems

commands.title: Download file from URL
commands.description: Download file from internet

commands.title: Clear terminal screen
commands.description: Clear all text from terminal screen

commands.title: Command history
commands.description: Show list of previously executed commands
